text.section:
A warrantor of a vehicle protection product sold or offered for sale in the State shall:
Be insured under a warranty reimbursement insurance policy; or
Maintain a net worth or stockholders' equity of not less than $50,000,000.
A warrantor that meets its financial obligation in accordance with subsection (a) of this section is not required to meet any other financial requirement or financial standard.

If a warrantor elects to meet its financial obligation in accordance with subsection (a)(2) of this section, the warrantor's parent company shall guarantee the obligations of the warrantor for the vehicle protection product warranties issued by the warrantor in the State.
